content.description: Sit start as for House Party, but go a right hand hold just over the lip. Requires a little technique ;)
content.location: Sit start the middle of the steep wall, same as House Party.

content.description: Sit-start with very short move from crimps to nicer crimps. Use the rough slopers to go straight up to top out.
content.location: Far right side of Prickly Pear Boulder.

content.description: Start same as velcro. Get up to the better rough slopers and then slap, heel, and toe your way across to the topout of Daddly Long Legs
content.location: Start on far right side of Prickly Pear boulder

content.description: Sit start on a sloping left hand side pull and a sharp very slightly in cut right hand. Slap big to the lip and then top out directly above. The rock that is separated by dirt is not on for feet.NOTE- See 1/17/21 comment about broken hold. RHall N.H Admin
content.protection: Ideally 2 pads but one will do
content.location: Once reaching the Upper Sector this boulder is directly in the center of the wall just right of Biker Slingshot.

content.description: Traverse right on the massive jug with platform feet and then follow up right using the same topout as biker slingshot. Easy cruising with a mildly difficult topout.
content.location: Furthest left boulder on the Upper Sector to the right of Biker Slingshot

content.description: Starts on a semi-incut crack, follow the decent crimps straight up and finally top out left.
content.location: Right to the left of House Party and all the way to the left of the Upper Sector Boulder.

content.description: Start as Velcro and the Traverse but top out on rough slopers in the middle instead of continuing to jugs on far left. Lots of high heels and mantling
content.location: Start on far right side of Prickly Pear boulderr.

content.description: Single low-ball wall spanning around 30 in width at about a 60 degree overhang. Most of the holds are pretty flat but sharp.
